title: Free win in Ranked disappeared
body:
I got 100 LP and was notified I had a free win for going back up a division I had already been to.
When I played my next ranked game and won I wasn't promoted.
I went to the ranked page and the blue icon that was there had disappeared.
I'm hoping to have this win added so I don't have to risk not making the promotions. 
I reported a bug but I've never got a response from reporting a bug before.
Hoping this will help actually have this fixed. 

Thank you! 
Sincerely,
Ohme

replies.body: I looked over you recent League history, and it doesn't look like you have a [**promo helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q3) currently. You'll only get a free win when you lose your promos and make it back into the series. You recently promoted to Silver 3, so this first time in your promos won't give you a free win.

I was in Silver 2 a month or two ago and dropped down to Silver 5 playing with friends; so far every time I've gotten to promotions I've got the notification and the free win, since I've been in Silver 2 division before I got the notification again, but the win disappeared after I played my next game. the promo helper pop did come up. 

Maybe I'm mistaken but I know I was almost to promo's for Silver 1 earlier this season and thought I'd get the free win every time up to promos for S1 (since I didn't win those); maybe I didn't understand the promo helper all the way.
